ships.name: Light Freighter
ships.effect: Does nothing more than carryig ressources
ships.flavor: The workhorse of the outer system trade routes.

ships.name: Light people carrier
ships.effect: Does nothing more than carryig people

infrastructure.name: Habitat Module
infrastructure.effect: Gain 1 Population each turn if placed on a colonized Planet.
infrastructure.flavor: Home away from home, with 0.3g gravity and filtered views of Saturn's rings.

infrastructure.name: Transport Grid
infrastructure.effect: For each pair of habitat in the planet, gain +1 population (and when new pairs of habitat are cnstructed)

mission.name: Moon Water Rush
mission.flavor: Water is the new oil—and Lunar deposits are booming.

astronaut.name: Rover Pilot
astronaut.effect: May reroll 1 failed exploration attempt per turn.
astronaut.flavor: If it's dusty, broken, and on fire — that's when I shine.

Sipre.name: Survey Shuttle NX-1
Sipre.effect: Gain 1 Exploration Point each time a new Planet is discovered.

Sipre.name: Founder's Bonus
Sipre.effect: At the beginning of game, take 5 additional SpaceCoins and draw 1 Tech card.

Sipre.name: Orbital Data Grid
Sipre.effect: When you accomplish a Mission, gain 1 Influence.
Sipre.flavor: Nothing gets done without the Grid.

planet_cards.name: Titan (Saturn Moon)
planet_cards.access: First 3 players to have range 3 rockets

technology_cards.name: Genetic Uplift Lab
technology_cards.effect: Gain 1 extra Population during each Income Phase.
technology_cards.flavor: Evolve or die — preferably in the lab.

event_cards.name: Solar Flare
event_cards.effect: All Infrastructure abilities are disabled this turn.
event_cards.flavor: When the sun sneezes, we all catch fire.

event_cards.name: Trade Surge
event_cards.flavor: The stars have never been so open for business.

event_cards.name: Volcanic Eruption
event_cards.effect: Each player roll a dice, if the result is 4 or more, they can't launch rockets from this planet
